entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow or periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing drizzle this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
